      • openBlob

        public void openBlob(BBjString blob$, BBjString name$)

        openBlob: open a document directly from a blob in memory

        Parameters:
        BBjString blob$ : the document as binary string
        BBjString name$ : the file name under which the file should be served The approrpiate viewer will be determined as of the extention of the name$
